headline: AES (AES) One-Off Gain Drives Margin Beat, Challenging Bulls’ Normalization Narrative
summary: AES (AES) posted revenue growth of 0.3% per year and finished the last twelve months with net profit margins of 7.6%, up from 6.7% a year ago. Earnings growth over the past year landed at 9.7%, trailing the company’s five-year average of 56.4% per year, with this period also including a significant one-off gain of $167.0 million. With profits benefiting from both a decade-long trend and some unique recent events, investors are left to weigh a historically strong run against forecasts for...
